attributes.action: Condemn the interference of President Donald Trump in the democracy of the UK .
attributes.background: Donald Trump has undertaken to influence the affairs of the United Kingdom and its Government through unwarranted interventions re Brexit, the office of Prime Minister, trade deals, the NHS & much else totally outside his competence in office.   'Special Relationship' does not equal 'lackey'.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
